attributes.action: reverse the decision to wind down and close the Home Department (formally Home Office) Vehicle Crime Reduction Team taken as part of the Home Office Reform Programme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Home Department (formally Home Office) Vehicle Crime Reduction Team (VCRT) has played a key role in the reduction of theft of vehicles and theft from vehicles.

The decision to wind down the VCRT is wrong. The VCRT acts as a focus and lead for front-line practitioners who are  implementing initiatives to deal with vehicle crime, at grass roots level. In particular dissolving the VCRT will seriously affect the development and implementation of a better regime to prevent the theft of both motorcycles and motorcycle parts.
